author: rffx
title: Multilingual dRep Resources
description: There are no enough dRep resources which serve as a starting point for new members and existing members in multiple languages. These are lacking resources to provide active engagement contribution.

author: fractalfuzion
title: DREP Marketing Blitz - Decentralize
description: Many Cardano users are unaware of project catalyst, how to be an informed voter, and the dRep role specifically. There is not enough Marketing. Lets fix it

author: jo8n
title: 💧 Democracy Means Everyone is dRep
description: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfPSb_cDlIxN6cnnbOrJN_oxDBmxB3kENbsE__pmMAw8yJk0w/viewform

author: nguyenthiha07tp1
title: dRep tool for non-English speakers
description: The busy dReps in non-English communities don't have enough time and language skills to select and vote on the right proposals. This affects the efficiency of voting delegation.

author: xeeban
title: dRep Education Book Club
description: IOG has recommended some books for dReps to read. It’s hard to get motivated to read books, and often harder to fully comprehend on one’s own. We benefit from a facilitated way to learn the material.

author: nguyenthiha07tp1
title: Support dRep Japan and Vietnam
description: The dReps in the non-native English community like Japan and Vietnam have difficulty reading and understanding meeting documents, announcements, and communications from Catalyst, Cardano.

author: matthalloran8
title: Beyond Text Proposals
description: Proposals are currently walls of text that most people don’t want to read.

author: jo8n
title: Everyone Start With More 👏
description: I ran out of 👏 to give. The Popularity ranking in Ideascale is wrong and sorts based on who put up a proposal first. dReps need accurate, accessible measurement of community sentiment.

author: crazy.brain
title: Supporting LATAM's dReps
description: Many LATAM dReps will have difficulties in carrying out their task due to the gap between their native language and English, resulting in under-representation.

author: antoine.cathalau
title: Documentary on Cardano's governance
description: Few people are aware of the potential of blockchain governance

author: jo8n
title: Condense PA/VPA Into New dRep Role?
description: PA/VPAs are redundant roles now with the new dRep role?

author: davidtuan
title: dRep easy find potential proposals
description: Lack of a comprehensive support tool makes it easy for dReps to find potential recommendations.

author: sebastiengllmt
title: Catalyst SDK dRep support
description: Cardano will be introducing dRep support for Catalyst. However, at the moment, there is no SDK for wallets and projects to implement dRep support

author: headelf
title: C4S-Educating Seniors as DReps
description: Seniors are often overlooked & not educated into new systems yet have life knowledge and experience. How can Cardano educate Seniors to take part of the DRepp process either as a team or solo DRep?

author: easterntownhall
title: Eastern Hemisphere dRep TownHall
description: Participating as a dRep is difficult when you live in a different time zone and when English is not your main language.

author: chrisaiks
title: dRep Awareness Creation
description:
Low participation rate in catalyst voting.
English Language barrier by some voters, posing a challenge in analyzing and voting for over 1,200 proposal
Low technological skills to set up voting App

author: vct
title: References for dRep
description: dRep are the people who have a great influence on the community . But many dRep do not have enough knowledge, experience and time to fully assess the proposals in different challenges.

author: vct
title: dRep Interview Channel
description:
A lot of people don't know about dRep
Voter doesn't have much information about dRep to delegate their vote
Many people want to become dRep but don't know how to introduce themselves to the community

author: latamcardano
title: DReps Open Debate
description: Need of an open space for dReps to address the community

author: alexp7
title: Underprivileged DREPS Campaigning
description: We need Dreps representing diverse regions and cultures. Those Dreps living in underprivileged countries will find difficult to achieve saturation, creating inefficiencies in the governance.

author: pocketkristin
title: Create a dReps' Equity Resource Hub
description: Fairness, particularly in permissionless and diverse communities, doesn’t occur organically. Without proper resources, even the best of dReps may unknowingly disenfranchise its marginalized members.

author: cardano4climate
title: Training dReps with Cardano4Climate
description: It is hard to understand and learn how to be a good dRep in isolation, there is a lack of community and collaboration in this space to ask questions and learn together to critically look at proposals.

author: sirwolcott
title: Catalyst Streaming Guild
description: There is a friction in proposers reaching supporters. A lack of communication and collaborations forces us to build silos.

author: zabelinaarina
title: Role interaction studies in Cardano
description: Voting in the Cardano system needs to be revised, since a significant part of the participants vote randomly, and the largest part of the platform participants do not vote at all.

author: christopherseuc
title: Community Workshop&Travel to France
description: Building longstanding relationships and collaborations can be a lot of work. Sometimes it is difficult to get a good sense of community members and the way they work.
